extension.name: DistriRend
extension.author: TroY
extension.description:
Splits a scene into two files which can be rendered simultaneously on two PCs.
Note that this is a trivial "workaround". It'll only work if your FOV is low enough. Furthermore, you'll have to manually merge the resulting images.
This plugin is not suited for doing serious distributed rendering but it can be useful in some situations.
